channel.title: ~Sokolscape Sourve V1~
channel.description:
[center][size=7][b]~SokolScape Source~[/b][/size] [size=6][b]!First Ever release![/b][/size][/center]
[i]This is my first ever source release. [/i] Please keep in mind that i have only been coding for 1 month. So dont hate..keep all comments polite(try) and give me constructive criticism please!!!
Common (Regular player) Commands - -Also check out ::modcommands ::admincommands ::ownercommands [code]::home ::drags ::train ::train2 ::train3 ::pkbox ::1v1pk ::skill ::fishing ::wc ::jad ::kqueen ::thestaff ::food ::gsmini ::mypk ::barrows ::slayer ::runes ::shops ::rules ::pots ::starter ::ground[/code]
New skill training place and wc place New Home New training area New Pking areas New welcome pop-up Great starter and starters outfit New Shopping area
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [center][size=7][b]~Sokolscape Videos~[/b][/size][/center] none of the vids are made by me..i dont know how to edit or how to post one..so these vids are very long and some arent too good =p but hey..atleast they put effort into making them
[b](2 videos below are not up to date with the source..sorry..a couple people from my server are going to be making some new vids..so i'll try to get a hand of those and post them ASAP !!!)[/b] [url=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=456qPxU95QM"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=456qPxU95QM[/url] [url=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAy-q3LlWJY"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAy-q3LlWJY[/url]
[b]This is the only vid at the moment that is up to date with the source[/b] [url=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bn_e9hhshEQ"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bn_e9hhshEQ[/url]
[b]CREDITS[/b] 5% Mod Allstar for the Allstar source (looks nothing like it..i know) 70% me and my friends for editing, adding, and deleting stuff on the source 25% for you guys on the forums for helping me code and get the server going
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK[/b] [url=http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES]http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES[/url] [url=http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES]http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES[/url] http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES http://www.uppit.com/LK36ES
http://files.filefront.com/Sokolscape+V1rar/;12435596;/fileinfo.html http://files.filefront.com/Sokolscape+V1rar/;12435596;/fileinfo.html http://files.filefront.com/Sokolscape+V1rar/;12435596;/fileinfo.html
PICS BELOW[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 12:41:52 pm[/size][hr][center]Pictures 1 Sorry for the small pictures..Click on them to enlarge[/center]
working dbow spec [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/9824/dbowspeclz8.png[/img][/url]
new 1vs1 pking spot [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/7464/new1v1pklw0.png[/img][/url] [code] Pkbox and 1vs1 pk is 1 huge room split into two pking spots.. west side is 1v1 pk and eastt side is no rules pking..in the middle are banks (which is a safe zone)[/code] new pkbox [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img357.imageshack.us/img357/9760/newpkboxfi3.png[/img][/url]
working godsword specials [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/4653/workinggsspecmv8.png[/img][/url]
working barrage specials [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/473/workingbaragezy9.png[/img][/url][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 12:42:38 pm[/size][hr][center][b]Pictures 2[/b] Sorry for the small pictures..click on them to enlarge[/center]
New Home [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/7279/newhomeot9.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img165/newhomeot9.png/1/"][img]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/newhomeot9.png/1/w510.png[/img][/url]
Training Area(I didnt edit this place much..all i did was put a talking npc there, banks and a couple KBD's..this will definetly be changed in v2) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/5783/trainvj6.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img257/trainvj6.png/1/"][img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/trainvj6.png/1/w512.png[/img][/url]
New Skill training area (every skill works !! except prayer..which is a mod+ skill - makes it easier to recognize staff) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/5001/newskillvl4.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img297/newskillvl4.png/1/"][img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/newskillvl4.png/1/w509.png[/img][/url]
New Dragon training area(will be changed in v2) [url=http://"http://imageshack.us"][img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/5494/newdragsai7.png[/img][/url] [url=http://"http://g.imageshack.us/img204/newdragsai7.png/1/"][img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/newdragsai7.png/1/w512.png[/img][/url]

item.title: ~Sokolscape Sourve V1~
item.dc:creator: @sokolscape sokolscape
item.description:
@sokolscape wrote:

THANK YOU !!! thanks a bunch full metalst…i’ll be giving you credits on v2 (in the making)

Allstar Deserves more than 5% Credits, He Made The Cases For Portals, Added Global Objects, That Training Was Already there, Dragons were already there, added cases for the skills area,added most of the shops and more..
Allstar doesn't deserve crap..putting cases to portals is NOTHING..you're seriously going to try to give credit for allstars global objects??? have you ever even used a source based on his??! hes got the most random shit on there..training was there but doesnt look to be purposely put there-it was not accessible by a command and it was not accessible unless you did a glitch- cases for the skills area was just wasting his time..none of the skills are interactive(except a few) and the almost all the shops were changed..you cant just look at the npc and thing the shops are the same if the npc is the same

so buddy…dont try to talk shit if you dont know what your talkin about

LOL could it be a lil thing called parental controls =)

Haha no. It’s my own computer and my parents don’t know the password…so it’s impossible for them to have gotten on

Read full topic
